biography:
Marin Aglić Čuvić is a software engineer adept in building data pipelines using Python Celery and Apache Airflow. He aims to improve the scalability, maintainability, and developer experience on the projects he works on. He is also passionate about data engineering.
Other than work, Marin likes writing articles in which he takes a deep dive into the technologies he uses or is passionate about.
name: Marin Aglić Čuvić
